text:
Ok so its coming from `handleTargetingAndDelay.ts`
The location is: `file:///Applications/Demostack.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar/dist/renderer/index.html`
Somewhere there you guys block the file:// protocol which is common for loading the html part of the electron application
I guess you don’t have a lot of clients using this in electron apps.
But maybe I’m totally wrong here :slightly_smiling_face:
BTW: when serving the html from a local server for example the widget loads
Intercom widget works like a charm in the file protocol
